title: Kindred Skins
body: Guys just please make more kindred skins. Ive been waiting for 87 years and ill buy a new one at any price. Heck take my firstborn child as a price just make a new kindred skin

replies.body:
Kindred have been out for such a long time and the most recent Champs get more skins than Kindred...
There's so much potential in that champ when it comes to skin themes and i hope that, when another skin happens, they wont
waste this potential on something like ''Super Galaxy'' seriously. 

Until then, Standard skin all the way{{champion:203}} {{item:3070}}
ikr the character design is so good and making a kindred skin would mean that people would play the champion more essentially making kindred more of a healthy champion than they are now
TRUE wish they made dark star kindred, but maybe in the next set, blood moon or project?
True, Jhin got all the skins I wish Kindred would've gotten, but I main jhin ADC so I can't complain -much-
